Title: The Professional
Writer: Patrick Alexander (novel), Georges Lautner (adaptation), Jacques Audiard (adaptation), Michel Audiard (dialogue)
Actors: Jean-Paul Belmondo, Jean Desailly, Cyrielle Clair, Marie-Christine Descouard
Plot: Victim of a plot which has resulted in his imprisonment in a Central African jail for two years, a French secret agent arrives in Paris to settle accounts.
